nodes.text: A second mission to Alashan was assigned to Luke Skywalker, Leia Organa, Mici Shabandar and the droids R2-D2 and C-3PO by the Alliance to Restore the Republic.

After stealing the Staraker, a new secret Imperial warship, Luke Skywalker, Leia Organa, Mich Shabandar and the droids R2-D2 and C-3PO were sent to the planet Alashan. They crash landed into the lava covering the planet. The Rebels finally dug their way out of the hardened lava only to be captured by Major Wil'm Grau and his men. The Imperials were without a ship, and Grau agreed to search the planet together under a banner of truce. The team finally found a destroyed Rebel archaeologist camp which had been working on an underground tunnel. The entire team decided to search the tunnel. Unknown to the group, they were being stalked by a beast native to the planet.
Journey throughout the City of Forever

Along with Major Wil'm Grau, the team entered an underground city and went exploring. There, Leia found strange markings on the walls of the city. She felt like she was familiar with them, but didn't know how. Leia, walking alone on a bridge, was attacked by the Sentinel creature. Luke rescued her by pushing Leia off the bridge, causing the both of them to fall off of the bridge. They were soon reunited with the group. After a hunt in which the Sentinel almost killed the team, Leia Organa found the source of the Sentinel's power in the Alashan control center. Upon destroying the structure, they were able to destroy the Sentinel. After digging out of the rubble, the team boarded the Staraker and Organa offers Grau a place in the Rebellion. However, he declined, leaving the ship in a scoutboat. As the Humans left the planet, the destroyed underground city came to life and a cryptic laughing resounded through the complex.

Grau and Anarine then left the world in the Staraker with the Rebels, where Organa offered Grau a position in the Rebel Alliance. However, Grau declined, and he and Anarine left the ship in a scoutboat to return to the Empire. The Rebel group then returned back to the Rebel Alliance's main base.
